creditline: Gift of James Ford and Louise H. Bell in memory of James S. and Sallie M. Bell
description: Portrait of Captain Parfitt. A swarthy gentleman with sideburns and dark straight hair brushed down over forehead. Slightly three-quarters pose. Black coat with high velvet collar and white stock and neck cloth of type fashionable about 1805. Solid dark grey background.
title: Portrait of Captain Parfitt
